definition: any of numerous fruits of the genus Citrus having thick rind and juicy pulp
details:
noun
- any of numerous fruits of the genus Citrus having thick rind and juicy pulp
= synonyms: citrus fruit, citrous fruit
- any of numerous tropical usually thorny evergreen trees of the genus Citrus having leathery evergreen leaves and widely cultivated for their juicy edible fruits having leathery aromatic rinds
= synonyms: citrus tree
